title: Deivam Thandha Veedu Lyrics Aval Oru Thodarkathai
stanzas: <div>Deivam Thandha Veedu Song Lyrics Aval Oru Thodarkathai

Deivam thandha veedu
veedhi irukku
indha oorenna
sondha veedenna
gyaana penne
vazhvin porulenna
nee vandha kadhai enna

naan kaettu
thaai thandhai padaitharaa!!
ilai enai kettu
en pillai pirandhaanaa!!

deivam seitha paavam idhu
podi thangachi
kondraal paavam
thindraal pochu
idhuthaan en katchi

aadhi veedu
andham kaadu
idhil naanenna
adiye nee enna
gyaana penne

verum koyil idhilenna
abishegam
un manam engum
theru kooththu
pagal vesham

kallikkenna mullil veli
podi thangachi
kaattukkedhu thottakkaaran
idhuthaan en katchi.

kondathenna koduppathenna
idhil thaai enna
manandha thaaram enna
gyaana penne

ennai thondi gyaanam
kandaen idhuthaan en katchi

unmai enna
poimai enna
idhil thaen enna
kadikkum thaezh enna
gyaana penne
category: OldSong:Deivam Thandha Veedu - Aval Oru Thodarkathai
